description: Capacity Development for the Formulation of a Policy and Regulatory Framework for Access and Benefit Sharing of Biological Resources in Malaysia

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: This projects aims to improve and strengthen the capacity in environmental management; establish a protocol for traditional biodiversity knowledge; and develop a National Policy and Regulatory Framework on Access and Benefit Sharing
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: E&E: Access & Benefit Sharing
